text: Jay Silverheels (born Harold Jay Smith, May 26, 1912 â€“ March 5, 1980) was an Aboriginal Canadian actor and athlete. He was well known for his role as Tonto, the Native American sidekick of the Lone Ranger in the American western television series The Lone Ranger. == Related pages == *List of poets from North America ==References== Category:1912 births Category:1980 deaths Category:Lacrosse players Category:Canadian movie actors Category:Canadian television actors Category:Canadian stage actors Category:Canadian voice actors Category:Canadian boxers Category:Canadian poets Category:Stunt performers Category:Writers from Ontario Category:Sportspeople from Ontario Category:Actors from Ontario
title: Jay Silverheels
